item.description: CAPTURED!!! John Brian Shepherd was taking into custody today by the Tyler County Sheriff’s Office in Tyler County thanks to a tip by a citizen. We would like to thank all those who helped with information. Countless man hours by our deputies went into this manhunt!

item.title: UPDATE: Mr Shepherd is still at large. It has been confirmed
item.description: UPDATE: Mr Shepherd is still at large. It has been confirmed he is no longer in the Silver Kia Sportage and was last known to be on foot. The Tyler County Sheriff’s Office along with other state and federal partners are diligently pursuing every lead to apprehend Mr Shepherd. It is unknown at this time if he is armed. Anyone with information is urged to call 304-758-2911. John Brian Shepherd appeared today in the Circuit Court of Tyler County in preparation for a trial to begin August 19, 2024 for the following charges; Sexual Assault in the First Degree; eight counts of Sexual Abuse by a Guardian; two counts of Sexual Abuse in the First Degree; one count of Sexual Abuse by a Parent, and one count of Incest. Mr. Shepherd was currently on a posted bond release with a condition of home confinement. Mr Shepherd cut his bracelet after court and absconded. Mr Shepherd’s direction of travel is unknown. If you have any information as to his location please contact the Tyler County E-911 Center at 304-758-2911.
